extendedInfo.description: For an overview of all the supported functionalities and the differences between the pro and lite version please visit http://www.webadminmobile.com/versions.**********With WebAdmin Mobile Pro you can manage your web server with DirectAdmin with your Android device by logging in with your admin, reseller or user account. For example, you can create users, resellers and administrators, manage your e-mail addresses, forwarders, subdomains and databases and view your server statistics. Multiple accounts can be added so that you can easily log in.

reviews.title: Good for 1.5 \342\202\254
reviews.comment: This is a good app, which got hurt by the high initial price. Hopefully the developer will continue to release updates. Editing users would be cool.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Cant administer users/resellers. Can only view or add them. Also cant administer admin settings. Useless app. NOT worth the price. Uninstalled!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not worthy of installation
reviews.comment: Purchased pro version. Complete rubbish, better off using web interface. Nice idea, not complete and poorly executed
reviews.author: Andrew Shaw

reviews.title: Not so good
reviews.comment: A good but not complete apps, like previous comments, can\'t administer reseller and user account, only can view and add them. Refund !
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work
reviews.comment: Keeps force closing. I want a refund or a program that works.
reviews.author: Robert Guenther
